segments.text: I'm looking into a kitchen, a typical indoor scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Three people are present: an adult woman and two children.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The light from the window suggests it's daytime outside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: On the right, water is pouring from a faucet and overflowing the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's forming a significant puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman, standing right in it, seems completely unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's meticulously drying a plate, completely engrossed in her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To the left, a boy is precariously balanced on a stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching into a cookie jar in an open cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A girl stands beside him, looking up expectantly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole situation feels like a ticking time bomb.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe the woman hasn't noticed anything yet.
segments.speaker: PAR
